roleset.name: put oneself into a fortress-like position
roleset.note: FORT_UP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fort up' based on sentences in brown. (from fort.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with location
example.text: The rest of us can fort up in the house and hang on until you get back.

example.name: often as imperative
example.text: Using his hands as a trumpet he shouted, ``[*] Fort up!''
